title: My Alpha's Ghost: Haunted
description: Death Comes to Lake Lazarus  Sebastian Bloodgood, omega of the Lazarus Pack, ached as the funeral rites were spoken for his fallen alpha, Damon Wakewood. After Damon’s ceremonial burning, a new alpha would be selected to take his place.  Sebastian didn’t want a new alpha; Sebastian wanted his mate.  For the entirety of his adult life, Sebastian has dreamed of Damon. Packlore holds such dreams as a portent for fated mates. With Damon dead, those dreams are all Sebastian has left.  Or so he thought.  This is book 1 in a serial. Book 2 is forthcoming.
author: G.G. Géricault
